alert.note: Alert for Clay; Fillmore; Hamilton; Nuckolls; Thayer; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 2:47AM CDT until July 18 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM CDT FOR CLAY...NORTHERN NUCKOLLS...SOUTHERN YORK...SOUTHERN HAMILTON... FILLMORE AND THAYER COUNTIES... At 246 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Saronville, or 21 miles east of Hastings, moving east at 45 mph. The Hastings ASOS reported a wind gust of 60 mph at 217 am. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Automated Weather Station. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Sutton around 255 AM CDT. Shickley and Grafton around 305 AM CDT. Geneva and Strang around 315 AM CDT. Ohiowa around 325 AM CDT. Milligan around 330 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Clay; Fillmore; Hamilton; Nuckolls; Thayer; York
